entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High plus 2.
